/**org.openpaas.ieda.deploy.web.common.dao.CommonDeployDAO.selectManifetTemplate*/
SELECT id, deploy_type as deployType, iaas_type as iaasType, release_type as releaseType, template_version as templateVersion, min_release_version as minReleaseVersion, common_base_template as commonBaseTemplate, common_job_template as commonJobTemplate, common_option_template as commonOptionTemplate, iaas_property_template as iaasPropertyTemplate, option_network_template as optionNetworkTemplate, option_resource_template as optionResourceTemplate, option_etc as optionEtc, meta_template as metaTemplate, input_template as inputTemplate, create_user_id as createUserId, create_date as createDate, update_user_id as updateUserId, update_date as updateDate FROM ieda_manifest_template WHERE UPPER(deploy_type) = #{deployType} AND LOWER(iaas_type) = #{iaas} AND release_type=#{releaseType} AND min_release_version = ( SELECT MAX(min_release_version) as min_release_version FROM ieda_manifest_template WHERE UPPER(deploy_type) = #{deployType} AND LOWER(iaas_type) = #{iaas} AND release_type=#{releaseType} AND min_release_version <= #{releaseVersion} )

/**org.openpaas.ieda.deploy.web.common.dao.CommonDeployDAO.selectReleaseInfoByPlatform*/
Select id, deploy_type as deployType, iaas_type as iaasType, release_type as releaseType, template_version as templateVersion, min_release_version as minReleaseVersion, common_base_template as commonBaseTemplate, common_job_template as commonJobTemplate, common_option_template as commonOptionTemplate, iaas_property_template as iaasPropertyTemplate, option_network_template as optionNetworkTemplate, option_resource_template as optionResourceTemplate, option_etc as optionEtc, meta_template as metaTemplate, input_template as inputTemplate, create_user_id as createUserId, create_date as createDate, update_user_id as updateUserId, update_date as updateDate FROM ieda_manifest_template WHERE UPPER(deploy_type) = #{deployType} AND LOWER(iaas_type) = #{iaas} ORDER BY templateversion ASC

/**org.openpaas.ieda.deploy.web.common.dao.CommonDeployDAO.selectIaasConfigAndAccountById*/ Select config.id as iaasConfigId ,config.iaas_type as iaasType ,config.iaas_config_alias as iaasConfigAlias ,config.common_security_group as commonSecurityGroup ,config.common_region as commonRegion ,config.common_keypair_name as commonKeypairName ,config.common_keypair_path as commonKeypairPath ,config.common_availability_zone as commonAvailabilityZone ,config.vsphere_vcenter_datacenter_name as vsphereVcentDataCenterName ,config.vsphere_vcenter_vm_folder as vsphereVcenterVmFolder ,config.vsphere_vcenter_template_folder as vsphereVcenterTemplateFolder ,config.vsphere_vcenter_datastore as vsphereVcenterDatastore ,config.vsphere_vcenter_persistent_datastore as vsphereVcenterPersistentDatastore ,config.vsphere_vcenter_disk_path as vsphereVcenterDiskPath ,config.vsphere_vcenter_cluster as vsphereVcenterCluster ,config.azure_resource_group as azureResourceGroupName ,config.azure_storage_account_name as azureStorageAccountName ,config.azure_ssh_public_key as azureSshPublicKey ,config.create_user_id as createUserId ,config.create_date as createDate ,config.update_date as updateDate ,config.google_public_key as googlePublicKey ,account.account_name as accountName ,account.common_access_endpoint as commonAccessEndpoint ,account.common_access_user as commonAccessUser ,account.common_access_secret as commonAccessSecret ,account.openstack_keystone_version as openstackKeystoneVersion ,account.common_tenant as commonTenant ,account.common_project as commonProject ,account.openstack_domain as openstackDomain ,account.google_json_key as googleJsonKey ,account.azure_subscription_id as azureSubscriptionId
